managed.help: Create a "managed" environment whose state we'll be encrypting and committing to Git

resume.help: Resume execution of a failed previous run

skip_branch.help: Skip creation of a new branch with a managed environment's files

vars_file.help: Ansible vars file to append to the generated environment"s vars file

k8s_masters.help: Number of K8S master nodes for respective ADs

k8s_master_shape.help: OCI Compute node shape to use for K8S master nodes

k8s_master_lb_enabled.help: Enable OCI Load Balancer in from of K8S master nodes

k8s_master_lb_shape.help: K8S Master OCI Load Balancer shape / bandwidth

k8s_workers.help: Number of K8S worker nodes for respective ADs
Number of K8S worker nodes for respective ADs

k8s_worker_shape.help: OCI Compute node shape to use for K8S worker nodes

etcds.help: Number of dedicated Etcd nodes for respective ADs (specifying 0 will colocate Etcd with K8S masters)

etcd_shape.help: OCI Compute node shape to use for dedicated Etcd nodes

k8s_ver.help: Version of K8S to install (masters and workers)

k8s_dns_ver.help: Version of K8S DNS to install

k8s_dashboard_ver.help: Version of K8S dashboard to install

flannel_network_cidr.help: A CIDR notation IP range to use for flannel

flannel_backend.help: Backend to use for Flannel, choices are vxlan, udp, and host-gw

ca_cert.help: String value of PEM encoded CA certificate, generated if not provided

ca_key.help: String value of PEM encoded CA private key, generated if not provided

api_server_private_key.help: String value of PEM private key of API server, generated if not provided

api_server_cert.help: String value of PEM encoded certificate for API server, generated if not provided

api_server_admin_token.help: String value of the admin user's bearer token for API server, generated if not provided

ssh_private_key.help: String value of PEM encoded SSH key pair for instances, generated if not provided

ssh_public_key_openssh.help: String value of OpenSSH encoded SSH key pair key for instances, generated if not provided

master_ol_image_name.help: Image name of an Oracle-Linux-7.X image to use for K8S master nodes

worker_ol_image_name.help: Image name of an Oracle-Linux-7.X image to use for K8S worker nodes

etcd_ol_image_name.help: Image name of an Oracle-Linux-7.X image to use for dedicated Etcd nodes

nat_ol_image_name.help: Image name of an Oracle-Linux-7.X image to use for NAT instances (if applicable)

control_plane_subnet_access.help: Whether instances in the control plane are launched in a public or private subnets

k8s_master_lb_access.help: Whether the Kubernetes Master Load Balancer is launched in a public or private subnets

etcd_cluster_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed to access the etcd cluster, must be a subset of the VCN CIDR

etcd_ssh_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed to SSH to etcd nodes, must be a subset of the VCN CIDR

master_ssh_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed to access the master(s), must be a subset of the VCN CIDR

master_https_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed to access the HTTPs port on the master(s), must be a subset of the VCN CIDR

worker_ssh_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed to SSH to worker(s), must be a subset of the VCN CIDR

worker_nodeport_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed to access NodePorts (30000-32767) on the worker(s). Must be a subset of the VCN CIDR

worker_iscsi_volume_create.help: Attach an iSCSI volume to attach to each K8S worker node

worker_iscsi_volume_size.help: Size of an iSCSI volume to attach to each K8S worker node

worker_iscsi_volume_mount.help: Mount path of iSCSI volume when worker_iscsi_volume_size

etcd_iscsi_volume_create.help: Attach an iSCSI volume to attach to each dedicated Etcd node

etcd_iscsi_volume_size.help: Size of an iSCSI volume to attach to each dedicated Etcd node

dedicated_nat_subnets.help: Provision dedicated subnets in each AD that are only used by NAT instance(s) (separate subnets = separate control)

public_subnet_ssh_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed to SSH to instances in the public subnet (including NAT instances)

public_subnet_http_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed access to port 80 on instances in the public subnet

public_subnet_https_ingress.help: A CIDR notation IP range that is allowed access to port 443 on instances in the public subnet

nat_instance_shape.help: OCI shape for the optional NAT instance. Size according to the amount of expected outbound traffic from nodes and pods

nat_instance_ad1_enabled.help: Provision a NAT instance in AD 1 (only used when control_plane_subnet_access=private)

nat_instance_ad2_enabled.help: Provision a NAT instance in AD 2 (only used when control_plane_subnet_access=private)

nat_instance_ad3_enabled.help: Provision a NAT instance in AD 3 (only used when control_plane_subnet_access=private)
